that package you pulled from the firefox website is not a debian package.  it's the application itself.  you can run firefox-bin from the folder you extracted, but other than that, there's no way to 'install' on Ubuntu what you downloaded.  the only way to 'install' it is to use the backports ubotu mentioned :)
